text: sum te allaha, je dareka vyaktini dekharekha rakhanara che, tene karela karyo mujaba jene loko allahana bhagidara therave che (barabara ho'i sake che), kahi do ke thodanka temana nama to lo, sum tame allahane te vato kaho cho je dharatimam janato ja nathi athava phakata upara challini vato karo cho, vata kharekhara evi che ke, inkara karanara'o mate temani yukti'o sanagari devamam avi che, ane temane satya margathi roki devamam avya che ane jene allaha pathabhrasta kari de, tene margadarsana apanara ko'i nathi
